titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on N-Ethyl-N-(3-sulfobenzyl)aniline (benzenesulfonic acid, 3-Y(ethylphenylamino)methyl?-).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on N-Ethyl-N-(3-sulfobenzyl)aniline (benzenesulfonic acid, 3-Y(ethylphenylamino)methyl?-).
